aboutMeIntroduction: As a Junior Frontend Developer with skills in JavaScript and Angular, I am passionate about building interactive and user-friendly web applications. My portfolio showcases projects I've done independently and with teams, focusing on clean code and responsive design.
aboutMeFirstParagraph: My interest in software development started while running an online store, where I built my own website using a website builder. This sparked my passion for web technologies and led me to further my education in this field. Moving from e-commerce to web development, I've used my attention to detail and problem-solving skills to create smooth digital experiences.
aboutMeSecondParagraph: I'm highly focused and enjoy working in teams, contributing positively to the work environment. I'm eager to grow as a developer and work on innovative projects. If you're looking for a dedicated and creative developer, let's connect and achieve your company's digital goals together.
skillsParagraph: I have gained experience in building projects with various front end technologies and concepts.
portfolioParagraph: Explore a selection of my work here - Interact with projects to see my skills in action.
joinParagraph: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
polloLocoParagraph: A simple Jump-and-Run game based on an object-oriented approach. Help Pepe to find coins and salsa bottles to fight against the giant Chicken.
otherParagraph: Task manager inspired by the Kanban System. Create and organize tasks using drag and drop functions, assign users and categories.
contactParagraph: Contact me through this form, I am interested in hearing from you, knowing your ideas and contributing to your projects with my work.
contactParagraphQuestion: Need a Frontend developer? Contact me!
thermsPart2: and agree to processing of my data as outlined.
